App.description: GloRe is an open network that aims to enlarge its audience both of volunteers and NGOs all over the world to make certificates available to everybody.

Common.errorMessage: Please try again or <contactUs>contact us</contactUs> if the problem persists
Common.notFoundMessage: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved

Auth.loginSubtitle: Enter an email or username to login to your account
Auth.passwordResetMessage: You will receive soon an email with a link to reset your password.
Auth.passwordResetSubtitle: Enter your email or username to receive a password reset link
Auth.signupDialogMessage:
Currently, you can sign up to GloRe only with an invitation from your organization.

If your organization is part of the GloRe network and you want to get access as a volunteer, tutor or coordinator, ask a representative to send you an invitation.

For more information, please visit our website.
Auth.signupMessage: Don't have an account? <link>Sign up now</link>

Modules.title: Learning modules
Modules.description: GloRe offers a wide range of learning modules to help you develop your soft skills and knowledge. Each module is designed to be interactive and engaging, providing you with the tools you need to succeed in your personal and professional life. After completing at least 3 modules, you will be able to request a certificate of completion.
Modules.notFoundMessage: The module you are looking for does not exist or has been moved
